name: Azalea
description: Azaleas are flowering shrubs that belong to the Rhododendron genus. They are known for their vibrant blooms and are often used in landscaping.

name: Daisy
description: Daisies are cheerful flowers with white petals and a yellow center. They symbolize purity and innocence and are often used in gardens and floral arrangements.

name: Spider Lily
description: Spider lilies are known for their unique, spider-like flowers. They bloom in late summer and are often associated with good fortune in some cultures.

name: Hydrangea
description: Hydrangeas are popular flowering shrubs with large, round flower clusters. They come in various colors and are often used in gardens and floral arrangements.

name: Lotus
description: Lotus flowers are aquatic plants known for their beautiful, large blooms. They are often associated with purity and enlightenment in various cultures.

name: Hibiscus
description: Hibiscus flowers are large, showy blooms that come in various colors. They are often used in tropical gardens and can also be made into herbal teas.

name: Sunflower
description: Sunflowers are tall, bright yellow flowers that follow the sun. They symbolize adoration and loyalty and are often used in gardens and as cut flowers.

name: Rose
description: Roses are classic flowers known for their beauty and fragrance. They come in various colors and are often associated with love and romance.

name: Blue berry Flower
description: Blueberry flowers are small, white to pink blooms that eventually produce blueberries. They are often found in gardens and orchards.

name: Aquatic Rose
description: Aquatic roses are unique flowers that thrive in water. They have delicate petals and are often used in water gardens and floral arrangements.
